main event: A UFO was observed visually in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania on September 21, 1954.
interesting points: The object was observed in formation with two other objects identified later as stars., Three observers reported seeing a round yellow-orange object for several minutes., The object was confirmed to be a star by police after multiple phone calls., The sighting occurred under clear conditions with no cloud cover., The object moved quickly heading northeast from the observer.
witness description: observers noted the object's unique appearance compared to stars
